https://bm.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=DescribePsaRegulations
&Limit=20
&Offset=0
&OrderField=CreateTime
&Order=1
&PsaIds.0=bm
&Tags.0.TagKey=测试_1
&Tags.0.TagValues.0=到底是范德萨
&<公共请求参数>
